paper_abstract: Purpose - The purpose of this paper is to explore the potential challenges in developing numerical methodologies for inverse problems and optimizations. Design/methodology/approach - Summarizing previous research results mainly contributed by two research groups of Zhejiang University and Hong Kong Polytechnic University. Findings - Computational intelligence plays an essential role in studying inverse problems and optimizations. Originality/value - An up-to-date review on the current status of numerical methodologies, especially computational intelligences, for inverse problems and optimizations contributed by Chinese researchers.
paper_title: Studies on numerical methodologies for inverse problems and optimizations in China
